snippet: The threat of automatic spending cuts and tax increases on Jan. 1 could force a genuinely bipartisan solution to the country’s budget problems.
abstract: Christina D Romer Economic View column contends the threat of automatic spending cuts and tax increases on Jan 1, 2013, could force a genuinely bipartisan solution to the country’s budget problems; offers thoughts about situation, and about how Pres Obama and Congress could make progress.
lead_paragraph: The threat of automatic spending cuts and tax increases on Jan. 1 could force a genuinely bipartisan solution to the country’s budget problems.
